test.doc: input text in google and verify results page content

test.name: Verify auto suggestion is shown for input text and upon selection it yields relevant results

kw.name: Open Search Page
kw.msg: Opening browser 'ff' to base url 'https://www.google.com/'

Verify Google Landing Page

Enter Search Text Scroll Through Suggestion

entered text in search box
